rdf:Description.dc:title: Identifying the gifted and providing for their education : an evaluation of school based procedures in the Edmonton Catholic School System 1984 an evaluation of school based procedures in the Edmonton Catholic School System /

Nyberg, Verner R., 1922-
Alberta. Alberta Education. Planning Services.
Strathcona (Alta. : County)

rdf:Description.dc:description: A.K.A. programs for gifted pupils in Edmonton Catholic Elementary schools. Alias Evaluation of programs for gifted pupils in the elementary schools of Edmonton Catholic School District.
Pt. 1 has cover title: Programs for gifted pupils in Edmonton Catholic elementary schools.
Pt. 2 has cover title: Honors program in a senior High School.
Pt. 1. Elementary school grades -- pt. 2. Evaluation of the Honors program in Archbishop MacDonald High School.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Gifted children
